member.name: M:GFU_PT_DAQ.Form2.drawChart
member.summary: Sub that is to be called to draw the chart when the data is updated.
member.remarks: All series are derived from the lists of data points (Legs, arms, seat), except for the listTimes list, which is created based on the length of the aforementioned lists.

member.name: M:GFU_PT_DAQ.Form2.STSChart_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sub that is triggered by a click event on the chart. Used to input program variables to calculate various slopes and forces.
member.remarks: @input xchartcoord This variable is set in the selection function "Chart1_MouseMove"
